title: Crypto Networks
author: Crypto Networks
created_time: March 13, 2023, 03:25:21 AMLast edit: March 16, 2023, 06:28:53 AM by Crypto Networks
content: 1. Bounty campaign will be managed by Crypto Networks 2. $5000 worth of 99KRYPTO coin are allocated for this Bounty.3. The bounty program was launched on 13.03.2023 and will run until 28.03.2023Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed, bounty manager reserves the right to make changes to the conditions at any time.Crypto Networks team can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We are responsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity. Participating in this bounty campaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.Â 1. All participants must join the 99KRYPTO official Telegram Group2. All participants must join Crypto Networks Telegram Group3. Talking about the bounty in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group.Please ask your bounty-related questions in the Crypto Networks4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed.7. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.Code:Proof of Authentication PostBitcointalk Username:Bitcointalk Profile Link:Telegram Username:Campaign Category Participated:BEP-20 Wallet Address:Twitter 60% Telegram 40%Week 1 (13.03 - 20.03)Week 2 (21.03 - 28.03)Submit your weekly report on bounty threadRewards500-1000 followers = 2 stakes/week1001-3000 followers= 3 stakes/week3001-5000 followers= 4 stakes/week5001 - 10000 followers- 7 stakes/week10000+ followers= 10 stakes/weekRules: Â 1. Every participant must follow 99krypto Twitter Page2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 500 followers.3. Participants have to make 3 new tweets and 5 retweets per week (maximum 1 retweet and 1 Tweet per day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 12 hours minimum.5. Participants must use #99krypto #token #bsc #cryptocurrency #presale #erc20JOIN HERE Rewards:Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â 5 stakes/week1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name | 99krypto (Example: Crypto Networks )2. Replace your profile picture with 99krypto Â Logo.Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Rules:1. Must join 99krypto Â Telegram group2. Write posts in the Crypto-currency Â group (only Post about the presale posts accepted)3. If you write any spam message you will be banned immediately4. Max posts per week: 55. You can ask questions about our Bounty in official group, but do not Spam!6. Participants must use #99krypto #token #bsc #cryptocurrency #presale #erc20JOIN HERE Twitter Report Code:campaign twitter Twitter profile link : Tweet link 1: Tweet link 2:Tweet link 3:Retweet link 1:Retweet link 2:Retweet link 3:Retweet link 4:Retweet link 5: Telegram Report Code:campaign telegram Â Telegram profile link : Comment 1: Comment 2:Comment 3:Comment 4:Comment 5:
